name: Kill Zombie!
summary_text: The bizarre story takes place in Amsterdam-West, where a virus turns people into bloodthirsty zombies. Although much blood is flowing and many limbs chopped off, there is a lot to laugh at in this bizarre horror comedy.

summary_text: Soldiers undertake the perilous task of removing a stockpile of World War II bombshells discovered during roadworks under the ground of a small village.

name: Split Second

name: La Bohème

summary_text: The spirit of a murdered girl returns with a message for the staff of a local radio station.

name: The Good Witch's Charm

name: Sadako 3D

name: Christmas Under the Stars
summary_text: A Christmas tree lot helps two people rediscover their holiday spirit.
